title: New: The Neighbourhood – Wires
body:
In the space of a matter of weeks, California’s **The Neigbourhood** have made themselves one of the hottest bands on the planet.

Their two tracks to date have been featured on almost every buzzblog in existence, and their EP _**I’m Sorry**_, which drops next week, will undoubtedly be met with a similar positive reception. Returning to their hip-hop roots, new track _Wires_ doesn’t disappoint with it’s slick production and anthemic vibe that will only serve to build the hype even further. Check out _Wires_ below.
